heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
contactCommunityText: Become part of our community and stay updated on our upcoming events and ceremonies.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon, created by combining two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of Chacruna (Psychotria viridis). This mixture, used for centuries in shamanic rituals, opens a portal to deep spiritual and psychological exploration.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine induces a modified state of consciousness that allows for introspection, emotional release, and connection with the subconscious. It is common to experience visions and deep revelations that help understand and heal unresolved traumas, fears, and blockages.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches and guides. Each experience is unique and is adapted to the needs of each person, offering the lessons necessary for their evolution and well-being. It is a powerful tool for self-knowledge and personal transformation.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of purpose and clarity about their life path after a ceremony.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of repressed emotions and the healing of deep traumas, lightening emotional burdens.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and fosters a deep connection with oneself, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Group ceremonies create a shared energy that enhances healing. Listening to others' experiences enriches one's own process and fosters a sense of community and mutual support.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized process, we offer private ceremonies. This format allows for a deeper focus on individual needs, with the exclusive dedication of the guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team of compassionate and experienced guides, dedicated to your well-being and transformation. We are here to accompany you with respect and professionalism on your inner journey.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this guide. Changes will be immediately reflected on the page.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide an image URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You are now signed in.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Fill in the details below to create your account.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been successfully created. Welcome!
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content, users, and settings.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details below.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony and all its data.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no active ceremonies at the moment. Please check back later.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to perform this action.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events. Find the experience that resonates with you.
mustBeLoggedInToViewCeremonies: You must be logged in to view the available ceremonies.
preparationProcessDescription: We begin with a mindful diet and mental preparation to open your spirit.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where you connect with the medicine under expert guidance.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep journey of introspection, revelation, and emotional release.
integrationProcessDescription: We support you in applying the lessons learned to your daily life.
dietSubtitle: For one week before and after the ceremony, we recommend a clean diet to prepare your body and spirit.
allowedFoodsList: Grains like quinoa, rice, and oats
White meats like chicken or fish (optional, minimal)
Herbal infusions and plenty of water
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass of your journey. A clear and open mind is essential.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you seek to heal or understand. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Journal your thoughts and feelings. What do you want to let go of?
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. It is a process of purification and release. Trust the process, allow yourself to feel, and know that you are in a safe and supportive space to heal. Our guides will be with you every step of the way.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound experience with these essential items.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, layered clothing (white or light colors preferred)
A blanket and a pillow or mat for comfort
essentialsList: A flashlight (preferably with a red light)
An open heart and a curious mind
Any personal amulet or sacred object (optional)
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this content.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and sacred process of the Ayahuasca ceremony.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find out how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for a transformative experience.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Country code is required if you provide a phone number.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Your email has been updated. You may need to log in again.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used to ensure your well-being during the ceremony.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your information has been saved securely. You can review your answers below.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, diabetes, etc.)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, supplements, or psychoactive drugs?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and their dosages.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your questionnaire has been submitted successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your first step on this journey is complete. We recommend you visit the preparation guide to get ready for your experience.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the system.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users, their status, and roles.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's submitted answers below.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted their questionnaire yet.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp message templates used to invite users to fill out the questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Hello! Please fill out the medical form here: [LINK]
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! Please fill out the medical form here: [LINK]
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
analyticsDescription: Track user clicks across different sections of the website.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click tracking data for all sections. This action cannot be undone.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view, reserve, and WhatsApp click counts for this ceremony to zero. This action cannot be undone.
editHeroVideoDescription: Change the main video on the homepage.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am the Spiritual Guide from 'El Arte de Sanar'. How can I help you on your healing path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review and manage system-generated error logs.
systemLogsDescription: A list of all recorded errors in the application.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this error log?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the recorded error.
backupSubtitle: Manage your application's data by creating backups or restoring from a file.
exportDataDescription: Download a JSON file containing all your Firestore data.
importDataDescription: Restore data from a previously exported JSON file.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite all current data in the database. This cannot be undone. An automatic backup will be created before proceeding.
rollbackCardDescription: Something went wrong with the import? You can roll back to the state saved right before the last import.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will overwrite the database with the data from the automatic backup created before the last import. Are you sure?
rollbackSuccessDescription: Data has been reverted to the previous state.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations with the spiritual guide chatbot.
allConversationsDescription: A list of all chat sessions, sorted by most recent.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
themeCustomizationDescription: Use the color pickers and inputs to adjust your site's appearance. The changes will be previewed live.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes globally.
themeTabDescription: Customize your website's color palette for both light and dark modes. Changes will be applied in real-time.
